name: Raymond Lirag
text: Goldilocks was lost in Singapore and she wanted to use her cel phone.     "This crowd is too packed!"    "This crowd is too sparse!"    "This crowd is juuuuust right!"    And then her cel phone got stolen anyway.

source_obj.text: Goldilocks was lost in Singapore and she wanted to use her cel phone.     "This crowd is too packed!"    "This crowd is too sparse!"    "This crowd is juuuuust right!"    And then her cel phone got stolen anyway.
